column4: problem: i have fully functional sound in gnome..  but in blackbox and fluxbox i do not get any sound at all.  ive searched the forums and stuff without luck.. HELP PLEASE?
: you wont have sounds of icons ect in blackbox.. there are no icons and stupid sounds..
: if xmms doesnt work change the audio out from esd to alsa
: blackbox is leet tho, no clutter and stupid things.
: run esd or change the audio out to alsa not esd for those apps...
: am sure it has an option somewhere...
: <robotgeek> thewayofzen: open up a terminal and type esd &
did you have to make any changes to have it recognise your artwiz fonts?
currently the packages from the breezy repos recognise my artwiz.. but when i do cvs build.. it wont antialias.. nor will it recognise the fonts as defined in the style
: might be since you are running the wrong binary
: updatedb ; locate blackbox | grep bin ; which blackbox
: might show you that there are two binaries and according to "which" you are running the wrong one
i actually apt-get removed blackbox from the repos first
: am implying there might be two, and that you are running the wrong one
im saying there is only the one binary though.
